Hydras:

"HE CAN COME!!!!"Snarled Hydras while whe started to strangle Nigh=
tshift again and while one of his dragon's head bite Nightshift's Comlink a=
ttemping to destroy it"ALL WILL DESTROY ALL THE PRIMES TOGETHER IF i NEED T=
O... BUT YOU!!!!! i WONT GRANT YOU WITHA MERCIFUL QUICK DEATH!!!!! A SLOW P=
AINFUL ONE AWAIT YOU!!! TAKE HIM TO TORTURE CHAMBERS!!! ALL THE SUFFERING T=
HAT THAT TUCSON PRIME HAD AVOIDED YOU WILL TAKE IT TWICE!!!!"


From: Sandy=
 
Sent: Tuesday, April 06, 2010 10:41 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subjec=
t: Re: BlackFortress


  
As Hydras takes his temper tantrum on Night Shift=
, Night Shift delays his reply for just a moment. A message, a silent com c=
omes through to him from Tucson Prime himself. It simply reads..

" Don't r=
isk your spark on my account. There's always a plan B."

Night Shift senses=
 the com link. He could now see that perhaps his plan was not working, yet =
he knew that his leader was not upset in fact more concerned for his saftey=
 more than anything else. It wasn't going according to plan and he knew it =
as well as Tucson did. He had underestimated his enemies and it was beginin=
g to bleed through. The best thing now was to tell the truth, and put up a =
good fight. He narrows his eyes.

" Ya want the truth huh? Okay, I'll give =
ya the truth."

He puts up his shoulder which has the Decepticon emblem and=
 changes it immediately to the Autobot symbol in front of Hydras.

"There's=
 your truth! You're right, I ain't a baddy after all, that's just a little =
trick I like ta play on creeps like you! I can't fly because like Tucson Pr=
ime, I'M AN AUTOBOT and will always be AN AUTOBOT! That little game was ta =
trick ya but I can see you're too smart for that. Well, now that ya know th=
e truth, go ahead, try'n blow me up lizard lips, because as soon as you do =
that, Tucson Prime's gonna be pretty slagged off and with a pair of missile=
 launchers on his cab I doubt you'll wanna mess with 'em now." 

As like Tu=
cson Prime, Night Shift puts his bravest foot and tire forward. He wasn't s=
cared, he knew what would happen after mouthing off to Hydras, but he was p=
roud of it. Proud to stick up for himself and his fellow Autobots no matter=
 the cost.

" This time, I ain't lyn'! You kick my aft, and he's gonna thro=
ttle yours! And know somethn'? I ain't gonna stop ya from don' that 'cause =
I wanna see what happens next!"

He stares Hydras with a dirty stare.

--- =

omething new, you Sneaky-bot??? Should I remind you that I, or better said =
my future self and same time past will murder or murdered PRIME???? a prime=
 is like another one... WHY DID YOU DELAY TO REPORT THAT??? For first time =
and much better... WHY YOU ALWAYS APPEAR and DISAPPEAR with out trace and n=
on knows your where-abouts? none the higher ranks like ME?????"
>

om

> Night Shift remains in SUV form=
 and pivots his tires toward Hydras.
> 
> "That's right, you don't know wha=
t happened do ya? Tucson's a Prime, he just got himself a sizeable upgrade =
from the Matrix. See, with my dual programming, I can get the scoop on any =
faction's business I want. And the Autobot programming I got, enables me ta=
 find these things out as they happen. And judgn' by the way my link reacte=
d, you thought Rodimus got big guns? This guys' packn' more power than two =
nuclear warheads combined. C'mon, if ya want power, Rodimus ain't the guy t=
a get it from. And I'm sure Rodimus would be really interested in tryn' ta =
take down Tucson Prime, that's if you guys got enough back bone ta do it. K=
eep in mind, he's got as much strength as Optimus Prime, and that ain't not=
hn' ta sneeze at."
> 
> While keeping in Decepticon code, he tries to open =
his Autobot channel to Lord Elder, keeping him informed of his progress.
> =

ited that she woke up

ess

> > 
> > 
> > Nightshift watches Scorponok. He tries to remain cal=
m and collected, acting like a sly Decepticon. Inside he was nervous. If th=
ey found out his true faction he would clearly be done for. His resemblence=
 to Tucson's old form was impecable, yet the only thing that separated him =
from Tucson was his black paint job and his accent. He had been manufacture=
d using the same specs and the same programming. Hopefully his configuratio=
ns would not be found out.
> > 
> > " What? What'reya lookn' at me like tha=
t for? I told ya everything ya need ta know and if I was one of them I woul=
dn'tve done that would I? Nope, not me, look, you guys can trust me, I'm a =
Decepticon, I may not be able ta fly but I am one of you guys. And thanks t=
a me ya now know that Tucson's got 'emself a hell of an upgrade. No Autobot=
 would give ya that kinda info."
> > 
> > He transforms back into SUV mode.=

> > 
> > "C'mon, I got lots more info where that came from. But I can't te=
ll ya here. We better get somewhere private where I can give ya the entire =
scoop."
> > 
> > Again, his tires kick up dust around Scorponok.
> > 
> > "=
My bad, my bad. Slag, might be time for me ta get new tires."
> >
